subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The United States captain Justin Abdelkader returned from a one-game suspension for a knee-on-knee hit and scored twice in a 5-4 win over Germany at the world championship in Belarus.
snippet: The United States captain Justin Abdelkader returned from a one-game suspension for a knee-on-knee hit and scored twice in a 5-4 win over Germany at the world championship in Belarus.
